article.headline: Nicholls St. 64, Southern U. 58
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. -- Anatoly Bose scored 16 points to lead Nicholls State to a 64-58 victory over Southern University on Saturday. Fred Hunter added 14 points for the Colonels (4-3), who held off the Jaguars (0-7) in the final four minutes. Nicholls State led 57-48 with 4:11 left before Southern's Chris Davis hit consecutive baskets and Geri Guillory made a 3-pointer to cut the lead to 57-55 with 2:40 remaining. The Colonels, however, went on a 6-0 run to increase their advantage to 63-55 with 21 seconds left. Nicholls State shot only 52.9 percent from the free throw line (9 of 17) but shot 45 percent from the 3-point line (9 of 20). Davis and Guillory led Southern with 12 points each. Douglas Scott had 11 rebounds for the Jaguars.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
